activities:
INetU is a managed service provider that collects personally identifiable information from prospective and current clients, employees, and vendors located in the European Union via our web site, Client Center, web forms, e-mail, on-line chat sessions, phone calls, third parties, and other sources.  INetU uses the information collected to communicate with the requesting parties to provide information related to our services, employment opportunities, support of our services, and business transactions.  For all personally identifiable information collected by INetU as described above--INetU follows the seven principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access, and enforcement as outlined by the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
INetU through its services provides data processing of personally identifiable information controlled by our clients.  INetU does not collect or use any personally identifiable information controlled by our clients.  Our clients, as data controllers, are responsible for handling that personally identifiable information in accordance with the necessary standards and regulations governed by that data.
